green cement-block structure
built about 1944 or 1945. An inventory of the place at present

wire, assorted tools, and the
transmitting apparatus: a large
console flanked by two receivers
and two transmitters.

operation. When transmitting,

station is licensed to Dr. Ferdinand Hamburger, Jr., the advisor.
